Room.Name: Alchemist
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a room with a number of bubbling liquids in vials of all sizes.
Room.LongDescription: You've never seen so many potions before, but none of them look like they are ready yet. This is the laboratory of the chief alchemist for the Lords of Kista, and he doesn't like visitors. He often asks the guards to throw out the people who come in here. There is a odd papyrus scroll on the wall.
